short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to remove the homepage videos on youtube so you're not distracted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Watubora" - a Chrome extension that helps you reclaim your focus and productivity by removing homepage videos on YouTube.

Are you tired of being constantly distracted by enticing videos when you open YouTube? Say goodbye to wasting time and hello to a clutter-free browsing experience. "YouTube Video Blocker" discreetly removes homepage videos, allowing you to stay on track with your tasks.

Why should you install it?

Boost productivity: Eliminate the temptation of YouTube videos and stay focused on your work or studies.
Reduce distractions: Say goodbye to getting lost in a rabbit hole of videos.
Take back control: Decide when and what videos you want to watch, rather than being lured into 

Install "YouTube Video Blocker" today and regain control of your time and attention. Experience a distraction-free YouTube homepage and unlock your full productivity potential.
